attributes.action: STOP BULLYING THE UK POPULATION INTO DOING WHAT THEY WANT!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Maybe the biggest bully in the uk is the government, its rather like living in a dictatorship, they say pay this and we have to, we don’t have any freedom in this country anymore, perhaps that is why so many are leaving the uk in search of a better lifestyle, even the council tax looks like a old mafia style protection racket, you get a demand each year which lists the service you are paying for including the police, if you don’t pay the bully boy bailiff’s come round to sort you out and take your things! It needs to stop and give people there free will back! Stop the government BULLYS!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
